thread.title: Israel ignores US Attack on Beirut continues, killing another Hezbollah leader
thread.title_full: Israel ignores US Attack on Beirut continues, killing another Hezbollah leader

author: world today news
title: Israel ignores US Attack on Beirut continues, killing another Hezbollah leader
text:
Israel launched its offensive in Beirut on Thursday, killing another Hezbollah leader, ignoring calls from the United States. and a nation of foreigners who want peace with Lebanon
On September 26, 2024, the Israeli Defense Forces (IDF) appeared on the Lebanese capital On Thursday, it killed Muhammad Hussein Surour, the commander of the Hezbollah air strike unit.
The IDF said Surur had been a member of Hezbollah since the 1980s and had supported and carried out numerous terrorist attacks against Israelis and IDF soldiers. the use of drones and other explosives
The Israeli prime minister’s office said Benjamin Netanyahu had approved the assassination attempt. While on a flight to New York City to attend the United Nations General Assembly
Israel launched a major offensive in Lebanon on Monday (September 23) and has continued its attacks over the past week. More than 600 people have been killed, with airstrikes on Thursday killing at least 26 people.
Israel’s latest attack also comes after Prime Minister Netanyahu told the Israeli army to wage war in Lebanon with all their might. He did not respond to calls from his 12 friends, including the United States and the United Kingdom. At the United Nations forum that asks Israel to cease fire with Lebanon for 21 days
#Israel #ignores #Attack #Beirut #continues #killing #Hezbollah #leader
2024-09-26 16:24:00
